title: Open Your Heart to Chance: a Golden collection
description: Open Your Heart to Chance: a Golden collection - four poignant (very) short tales about life lost, hope regained, and that special bond between humans and their canine companions.PDF version is available here. Versions for Kindle and other e-readers are available for download at Smashwords.The collection is free, but readers have the option to visit my "Open Your Heart to Chance" page at Imagination Ether Press [http://imaginationetherpress.blogspot...] and donate a dollar to help support the Yankee Golden Retriever Rescue foundation. All proceeds generated by this particular collection WILL be donated to YGRR.
author: Devon Winterson
